name: components
desc:
This library contains the different reusable components that are used
throughout the app.

name: ActionButton
desc: Creates a floating action button that does something when clicked.

name: build
desc: Builds the ActionButton Widget.

name: icon
desc: Icon to display on the button.

name: actionableNavBar
desc:
Extension of a NavigableNavBar that allows for navigation and actions
in the nav bar.

name: actionableNavigableNavBar
desc:
Extension of a NavigableNavBar that allows for navigation and actions
in the nav bar.

name: backNavigableNavBar
desc: Extension of an actionableNavigableNavBar that navigates back.

name: AirportCard
desc:
Card representation of an Airport object. Card shows important information
about the airport, such as the name of the airport and the approximate
distance from the user's current location.

name: AirportCard
desc: Constructor for AirportCard.

name: airport
desc: Airport object that contain information on the airport in question.

name: build
desc: Builds the AirportCard Widget.

name: service
desc: Service that returns the current location of the user.

name: ClickableIcon
desc: Generates a generic icon button that does something when clicked.

name: build
desc: Builds the ClickableIcon Widget.

name: icon
desc: Icon to display on the button.

name: iconColor
desc: Color of the icon.

name: iconSize
desc:
Size of the icon. If null, then the default size of the icon given in the
Theme of the app will be used.

name: Confirmation
desc:
Abstract class that generate Confirmation Dialogs which prompt users for
their acknowledgement to events that occur within the app.

name: confirmCancelDialog
desc:
Simple Confirmation Dialog that display decisions to the user,
which requires the user's permission and acknowledgement to proceed.

name: confirmDialog
desc:
Simple Information Dialog that displays information to the user,
which requires the user's acknowledgement.

name: DocumentCard
desc:
Card representation of a Document object. This card also allow users to
interact with the Document object and view the data attached to the
object.

name: bodyStyle
desc: TextStyle for the body text of the Card.

name: build
desc: Builds the DocumentCard Widget.

name: controller
desc:
Controller for the Document object, necessary to make the Document card
responsive to changes made on the Document object.

name: documentId
desc: ID attached to the Document object.

name: normalSubtitleStyle
desc: General TextStyle for subtitles.

name: normalTitleStyle
desc: General TextStyle for titles.

name: ElevatedIconButton
desc:
Creates a general full-width button with an icon that does something
when clicked.

name: borderColor
desc: Color of the border that surrounds the button.

name: borderRadius
desc: Radius of the corners of the button.

name: borderWidth
desc: Border width of the button.

name: build
desc: Builds the ElevatedIconButton Widget.

name: buttonBackgroundColor
desc: Background color of the button.

name: icon
desc: Icon to display on the button.

name: iconColor
desc: Color of the icon.

name: iconHeightScaler
desc: Scalar value which determines the size of the button from the given height.

name: label
desc: Text to render as the label of the button.

name: labelColor
desc: Color of the label text.

name: labelSize
desc: Font size of the label.

name: EmptyCard
desc: Card that represents an empty collection.

name: EmptyCard
desc: Constructor for EmptyCard.

name: build
desc: Builds the EmptyCard Widget.

name: type
desc: Enum constant that represents the type of collection that is empty.

name: FolderCard
desc:
Card representation of a Folder object. This card also allow users to
interact with the Folder object and view the data attached to the
object.

name: build
desc:
TextStyle for the Subtitles of the Card.
Builds the FolderCard Widget.

name: documentController
desc:
Controller for the Document object, necessary to make the Document card
responsive to changes made on the Document object.

name: folderController
desc:
Controller for the Folder object, necessary to make the FolderCard
responsive to changes made on the Folder object.

name: folderId
desc: ID attached to the Folder object.

name: normalSubtitleStyle
desc:
TextStyle for the Titles of the Card.
General TextStyle for subtitles.

name: normalTitleStyle
desc:
Constrating color of the background of this FolderCard. This color is
used primarily to display visible text over any FolderCard.
General TextStyle for titles.

name: GeneralElevatedButton
desc: Creates a general full-width button that does something when clicked.

name: borderColor
desc: Color of the border that surrounds the button.

name: borderRadius
desc: Radius of the corners of the button.

name: borderWidth
desc: Border width of the button.

name: build
desc: Builds the GeneralElevatedButton Widget.

name: buttonBackgroundColor
desc: Background color of the button.

name: iconHeightScaler
desc: Scalar value which determines the size of the button from the given height.

name: label
desc: Text to render as the label of the button.

name: labelColor
desc: Color of the label text.

name: labelSize
desc: Font size of the label.

name: GeneralNavBar
desc:
Abstract class that contains general nav bars that merely show the back
button and the title.

name: backNavigableNavBar
desc:
Extension of a NavigableNavBar that goes back to the previous page when
the icon is clicked.

name: navigableNavBar
desc: A nav bar that allows for navigation with a singular button.

name: simpleNavBar
desc: Creates a simple Nav Bar without any icons.

name: GenericCard
desc:
Highest level Card class that grants all subclasses access to a
random color generator and a random image generator.

name: GenericCard
desc: Abstract Constructor that cannot be invoked directly.

name: buildRandomImageQuery
desc:
Returns the constructed URL to pass into a network image provider
to request for a random image based on the Location location
and the topics parameter.

name: endpoint
desc: Endpoint for the random image generator API.

name: getRandomColor
desc: Returns a randomly generated color.

name: getRandomImage
desc: Returns a provider for a network image that is cached.

name: HomeTripCard
desc:
Alternative Card representation of a Trip object. This Card widget is used
exclusively on the Home Page of the app only.

name: HomeTripCard
desc: Constructor of the Card. Accepts a Trip object trip or null.

name: build
desc: Constructs the HomeTripCard and displays it.

name: trip
desc: Trip or null object which this card represents.

name: HotelCard
desc:
Card representation of a Hotel object. Card shows information about the
hotel, such as the name of the hotel and approximate distance from the
user's current location.

name: HotelCard
desc: Constructor for HotelCard.

name: build
desc: Builds the HotelCard Widget

name: hotel
desc: Hotel object that contains information on the hotel in question.

name: service
desc: Service that returns the current location of the user.

name: PlaceOfInterestCard
desc:
Card representation of a PlaceOfInterest object. Card shows important
information about the place of interest (POI), such as the name of the
POI and the approximate distance from the user's current location.

name: PlaceOfInterestCard
desc: Constructor for PlaceOfInterestCard.

name: build
desc: Builds the PlaceOfInterestCard Widget.

name: poi
desc: PlaceOfInterest object that contain information on the POI in question.

name: service
desc: Service that returns the current location of the user.

name: Search
desc: Reusable Search Bar.

name: Search
desc: Constructor for Search.

name: build
desc: Builds the Search Widget.

name: searchController
desc: Controller used by the SearchAnchor to manage user query actions.

name: searchTitle
desc:
Text that is displayed within the Search Bar to give context to the
search action the user can perform.

name: suggestionsBuilder
desc:
Method that is invoked to create the suggestion cards and other
relevant objects when the user enters in a query.

name: SignInButtonBuilder
desc: Builder class for the Sign In with ... buttons.

name: SignInButtonBuilder
desc: Button Constructor

name: backgroundColor
desc:
backgroundColor is required but textColor is default to Colors.white
splashColor is default to Colors.white30

name: build
desc: The build function will be help user to build the signin button widget.

name: elevation
desc: elevation has default value of 2.0

name: fontSize
desc: The size of the label font

name: height
desc: the height of the button

name: highlightColor
desc:
backgroundColor is required but textColor is default to Colors.white
splashColor is default to Colors.white30

name: icon
desc:
Icon can be used to define the signin method
User can use Flutter built-in Icons or font-awesome flutter's Icon

name: iconColor
desc:
backgroundColor is required but textColor is default to Colors.white
splashColor is default to Colors.white30

name: image
desc:
Override the icon section with a image logo
For example, Google requires a colorized logo,
which FontAwesome cannot display. If both image
and icon are provided, image will take precedence

name: innerPadding
desc: padding is default to EdgeInsets.all(3.0)

name: mini
desc: mini tag is used to switch from a full-width signin button to

name: onPressed
desc: onPressed should be specified as a required field to indicate the callback.

name: padding
desc: padding is default to EdgeInsets.all(3.0)

name: shape
desc:
shape is to specify the custom shape of the widget.
However the flutter widgets contains restriction or bug
on material button, hence, comment out.

name: splashColor
desc:
backgroundColor is required but textColor is default to Colors.white
splashColor is default to Colors.white30

name: text
desc: the button's text

name: textColor
desc:
backgroundColor is required but textColor is default to Colors.white
splashColor is default to Colors.white30

name: width
desc: width is default to be 1/1.5 of the screen

name: Skeletons
desc:
Abstract class that holds the different skeleton loaders used throughout
the app.

name: Tags
desc: Abstract class made to contain the different types of Tags used in the app.

name: betaTag
desc:
Returns a "BETA" tag, which signal to users that the feature they have
requested is still in its Beta testing phases and may not be stable.

name: TripCard
desc:
Card representation of a Trip object. This card also allow users to
interact with the Trip object and view the data attached to the
object.

name: build
desc: Builds the TripCard Widget.

name: callback
desc: Method that is invoked when the Card is tapped on.

name: documentController
desc:
Controller for the Document objects that are contained within the Trip
object.

name: tripId
desc: ID attached to the Trip object.

name: WeatherCard
desc:
Card that represents the weather at a particular Trip destination,
represented by a Location object.

name: WeatherCard
desc: Constructor for WeatherCard.

name: build
desc: Builds the WeatherCard Widget.

name: location
desc:
Location object that contains information requried for the weather data
query done by the WeatherService.

name: service
desc: Service that queries for the current weather at the destination.

name: controllers
desc:
This library contains the different Getx Controllers that are used
throughout the app.

name: ButtonScrollController
desc:
Simple class that helps control the hiding and showing of buttons on
user scroll.

name: isScrolled
desc: Tracks the scroll status of a button

name: setScrollDown
desc: Sets the scroll status to "scrolled down".

name: setScrollUp
desc: Sets the scroll status to "scrolled up".

name: DocumentController
desc:
GetxController that controls Document objects, and provide interface
methods to interact with them.

name: addDocument
desc: Adds a Document to the sub-controller.

name: deleteDocument
desc:
Deletes a Document entry available within the sub-controller from the
server.

name: download
desc: Downloads the file into the device's storage folder and persists the file.

name: DocumentController.fromFolder
desc:
Constructs a DocumentController that pulls all Documents related to a
particular Folder object.

name: DocumentController.fromTrip
desc:
Constructs a DocumentController that pulls all Documents related to a
particular Trip object.

name: DocumentController.fromUser
desc:
Constructs a DocumentController that pulls all Documents related to a
particular User.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: obsDocuments
desc:
List of Document objects, made observable so that Widgets dependent on
the Documents managed by this controller will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: open
desc:
Opens up the document. Unlike download(), this method saves the file
to a temporary directory and deletes the file once done.

name: openPath
desc: Opens up a document that is already persisted on the device storage.

name: reload
desc: Reloads the controller.

name: service
desc: Service that facilitate connections to the Firestore Database on Firebase.

name: updateDetails
desc: Updates the Document object with a new document name and color.

name: where
desc:
Return an instance of Document whose ID matches that of the parameter
documentId contained within the observable Documents list.

name: withFolder
desc: Include a Folder ID with the controller.

name: withTrip
desc: Include a Trip ID with the controller.

name: withUser
desc: Include a User ID with the controller.

name: ExpenseController
desc:
GetxController that controls Expense objects, and provide interface methods
to interact with them.

name: addExpense
desc:
Adds an Expense object to the Firestore DB, and tag it to the parent
collection that was used to instantiate this controller with.

name: deleteExpense
desc:
Deletes an Expense object in Firestore DB, and delete it within the parent
collection that was used to instantiate this controller with.

name: editExpense
desc:
Edits an Expense object in Firestore DB, and update it within the parent
collection that was used to instantiate this controller with.

name: ExpenseController.fromTrip
desc:
Constructs an ExpenseController that pulls all Expenses related to a
particular Trip object.

name: ExpenseController.fromUser
desc:
Constructs an ExpenseController that pulls all Expenses related to a
particular User.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: obsExpenses
desc:
List of Expense objects, made observable so that Widgets dependent on
the Expenses managed by this controller will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: reload
desc: Reloads the controller and fetch data from the server.

name: service
desc:
Service that allows connections to the Firestore DB, and facilitates
CRUD actions on the DB via the app.

name: to
desc: Returns the latest ExpenseController that is being tracked.

name: totalBalance
desc: The difference in inflow and outflow.

name: totalExpense
desc: The total outflow of budget.

name: totalIncome
desc: The total inflow of budget.

name: tripId
desc: Optional Trip ID.

name: FilePickerController
desc: GetxController that manages the state of the FilePicker Widget.

name: pickFiles
desc:
Invokes the FilePicker Widget and prompts the user to select files
for upload.

name: picker
desc:
Contains the resulting files picked by the Widget, made observable so
that changes made to this value will invoke the necessary rebuilds of
widgets that depend on this controller.

name: refresh
desc: Refreshes the controller.

name: FolderController
desc:
GetxController that controls Folder objects, and provide interface
methods to interact with them.

name: addDocumentToFolder
desc: Adds a Document object into another Folder object.

name: addFolder
desc:
Adds a Folder to the collection that was used to create this
FolderController.

name: addFolderToFolder
desc: Adds a Folder object into another Folder object.

name: deleteDocumentFromFolder
desc: Deletes a Document object from another Folder object.

name: deleteFolder
desc:
Deletes a Folder entry available within the parent collection from the
server.

name: deleteFolderFromFolder
desc: Deletes a Folder object from another Folder object.

name: FolderController.fromFolder
desc:
Constructs an FolderController that pulls all Folders related to a
particular User.

name: FolderController.fromTrip
desc:
Constructs a FolderController that pulls all Folders related to
a particular Trip object.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: obsFolders
desc:
List of Folder objects, made observable so that Widgets dependent on
the Folders managed by this controller will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: reload
desc: Reloads the controller and fetch data from the server.

name: service
desc:
Service that allows connections to the Firestore DB, and facilitates
CRUD actions on the DB via the app.

name: updateDetails
desc: Updates the Folder object with a new folder name and color.

name: where
desc:
Return an instance of Folder whose ID matches that of the parameter
folderId contained within the observable Folders list.

name: ItineraryController
desc:
GetxController that controls Itinerary objects, and provide interface
methods to interact with them.

name: deleteItinerary
desc:
Deletes an Itinerary object in Firestore DB, and delete it within
the parent collection that was used to instantiate this controller with.

name: editItinerary
desc:
Adds an Itinerary object to the Firestore DB, and tag it to the parent
collection that was used to instantiate this controller with.

name: ItineraryController.fromTrip
desc:
Constructs an ItineraryController that pulls all Itineraries related to a
particular Trip object.

name: ItineraryController.fromUser
desc:
Constructs an ItineraryController that pulls all Itineraries related to a
particular User.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: isLoadingSuggestions
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
the AI-generated Itinerary suggestions or has completed the loading
process.

name: newDayFlag
desc:
A list of booleans that maps to the observable Itinerary list, which
marks an itinerary entry as the beginning of a new day.

name: obsItineraries
desc:
List of Itinerary objects, made observable so that Widgets dependent on
the Itineraries managed by this controller will be updated on change.

name: obsSuggestedItinerary
desc:
List of Itinerary objects for AI suggestion, made observable so that
Widgets dependent on the AI-generated Itineraries managed by this
controller will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: reload
desc: Reloads the controller and fetch data from the server.

name: resetSuggestedItinerary
desc: Reset the AI-generated itinerary to its default state.

name: service
desc: Service that facilitate connections to the Firestore Database on Firebase.

name: startLoadSuggestedItinerary
desc: Begins the loading phase for the AI-generated itinerary.

name: stopLoadSuggestedItinerary
desc: Ends the loading phase for the AI-generated itinerary.

name: to
desc: Returns the latest ItineraryController that is being tracked.

name: tripId
desc: Optional Trip ID.

name: updateSuggestedItinerary
desc: Update the AI-generated itinerary with a new itinerary.

name: NearbyAirportController
desc:
GetxController to manage Airport objects, which represents Airports that
are near the destination location of Trip objects.

name: NearbyAirportController
desc: Constructor for NearbyAirportController.

name: client
desc: HTTP Client.

name: getNearbyAirports
desc: Queries for nearby airports using the Google Places API.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: location
desc: The Location to do the nearby airport search.

name: obsAirport
desc:
List of Airport objects, made observable so that Widgets dependent on
the Airports managed by this controller will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: NearbyHotelController
desc:
GetxController to manage Hotel objects, which represents Hotels that
are near the destination location of Trip objects.

name: NearbyHotelController
desc: Constructor for NearbyHotelController.

name: client
desc: HTTP Client.

name: getNearbyHotels
desc: Queries for nearby hotels using the Google Places API.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: location
desc: The Location to do the nearby hotel search.

name: obsHotel
desc:
List of Hotel objects, made observable so that Widgets dependent on
the Hotels managed by this controller will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: NearbyPlaceOfInterestController
desc:
GetxController to manage PlaceOfInterest objects, which represents
places of interest that are near the destination location of Trip objects.

name: NearbyPlaceOfInterestController
desc: Constructor for NearbyPlaceOfInterestController.

name: client
desc: HTTP Client.

name: getNearbyPOI
desc: Queries for nearby places of interest using the Google Places API.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: location
desc: The Location to do the nearby place of interest search.

name: obsPOI
desc:
List of PlaceOfInterest objects, made observable so that Widgets
dependent on the PlaceOfInterests managed by this controller
will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: SplashController
desc: GetxController for the Splash Screen.

name: pageController
desc: Page controller to manage the scrolling of pages.

name: selectedPageIndex
desc: Current index of the page.

name: splashPages
desc: List of Splash Pages.

name: to
desc: Static getter to return the latest cached instance of a SplashController.

name: TravellerController
desc: GetxController to manage fellow Users who are collaborating on a Trip.

name: TravellerController
desc: Constructor for TravellerController.

name: addTraveller
desc: Add a User object to a Trip object.

name: deleteTraveller
desc: Deletes a User object from a Trip object.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: obsTravellers
desc: List of Users who are travelling with a User on a Trip.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: reload
desc: Reloads the controller and fetch data from the server.

name: service
desc:
Service that allows connections to the Firestore DB, and facilitates
CRUD actions on the DB via the app.

name: to
desc: Returns the latest TravellerController that is being tracked.

name: tripId
desc: Trip ID of the Trip in question.

name: where
desc:
Return an instance of User whose ID matches that of the parameter
userId contained within the observable User list.

name: TripController
desc:
GetxController that controls Trip obejcts, and provide interface methods
to interact with them.

name: TripController
desc: Constructor for TripController.

name: addDocumentToTrip
desc: Adds a Document object from another Trip object.

name: addFolderToTrip
desc: Adds a Folder object into another Trip object.

name: addTrip
desc:
Adds a Trip to the collection that was used to create this
TripController.

name: deleteDocumentFromTrip
desc: Deletes a Document object from another Trip object.

name: deleteFolderFromTrip
desc: Deletes a Folder object from another Trip object.

name: deleteTrip
desc:
Deletes a Trip entry available within the parent collection from the
server.

name: deleteUserFromTrip
desc: Deletes a User object from another Trip object.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: leaveTrip
desc: Remove a Trip from a User's list of Trips.

name: obsTrips
desc:
List of Trip objects, made observable so that Widgets dependent on
the Trips managed by this controller will be updated on change.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: reload
desc: Reloads the controller and fetch data from the server.

name: service
desc:
Service that allows connections to the Firestore DB, and facilitates
CRUD actions on the DB via the app.

name: to
desc: Returns the latest TripController that is being tracked.

name: updateDetails
desc: Updates the Folder object with a new folder name and color.

name: where
desc:
Return an instance of Trip whose ID matches that of the parameter
tripId contained within the observable Trips list.

name: UserController
desc:
GetxController that controls User objects, and provide interface
methods to interact with them.

name: acceptFriendRequest
desc: Accepts an incoming friend request and add them to the User's friend list.

name: addDocumentToUser
desc: Add a Document object to a User object.

name: addTripToUser
desc: Adds a Trip object to a User object.

name: deleteDocumentFromUser
desc: Delete a Document object from a User object.

name: deleteFriend
desc: Deletes a User from the User's friend list.

name: deleteTripFromUser
desc: Delete a Trip object from a User object.

name: getSuggestions
desc:
Autocompletion method for finding friends through the add friend/
invite friend feature.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: obsFirebaseUser
desc: The Firebase Auth User entry related to the current user.

name: obsTravelaUser
desc: The Firebase Firestore User entry related to the current user.

name: obsUsers
desc: List of Users which are related to the current user.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: pickCameraImage
desc: Takes a picture using the User's device's in-built camera.

name: pickGalleryImage
desc: Select an Image from the User's device.

name: pickImage
desc:
Prompts the user to pick the method to upload a photo, either using the
device's storage or camera.

name: picker
desc: Image Picker to select images for the User's profile picture.

name: rejectFriendRequest
desc: Reject an incoming friend request.

name: sendFriendRequest
desc: Creates a friend request and sends it to the User of interest.

name: service
desc:
Service that allows connections to the Firestore DB, and facilitates
CRUD actions on the DB via the app.

name: to
desc: Returns the latest UserController that is being tracked.

name: uploadImage
desc: Upload the profile image onto the server.

name: WeatherController
desc:
GetxController that manages the querying and parsing of weather data from
the OpenWeather API.

name: WeatherController
desc:
Constructor for WeatherController. Requires a Location location to
determine the location to check weather for.

name: currentWeather
desc: Returns the current weather.

name: dispatchWeather
desc:
Parses the Weather object and returns the WeatherType classification,
which tells the WeatherBg object what animation to render.

name: getWeatherAnimation
desc:
Returns the relevant WeatherBg widget whose animations corresponds to the
current weather conditions at the Location.

name: grouped
desc:
Groups the Weather objects in obsWeather according to the date of the
weather data.

name: location
desc:
Location object which contains geo data on where to query weather
data from.

name: obsWeather
desc:
List of Weather objects. These objects represent the current and
forecasted weather of the Location of query.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the Controller.

name: service
desc: Service that returns the weather data of a queried Location.

name: enums
desc: This library contains the different enums used throughout the application.

name: DocumentCardEnum
desc:
Simple Enum thatp helps to distinguish the activities that users can do
on any Document Card.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: EmptyCardEnum
desc:
Simple enum used by the EmptyCard Widget to determine the string displayed
to the user to alert them that the appropriate collection is empty.

name: EmptyCardEnum
desc: Constructor used to create the enum constants.

name: identifier
desc: String to render to alert user of the empty collection status.

name: toString
desc: String representation of the enum constant.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: SearchEnum
desc:
Enum that contains the different types of search results that can be
queried with a Search widget.

name: SearchEnum
desc:
Enum Constructor used to create the constants with their associated
String and Icon representations.

name: icon
desc: Icon representation of the different enum constants.

name: identifier
desc: String identifier of the different enum constants.

name: SearchEnum.parse
desc:
Accepts a String input that corresponds to identifier, and returns
the relevant enum constant.

name: toString
desc: String representation of the enum constant.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: DefaultFirebaseOptions
desc: Default FirebaseOptions for use with your Firebase apps.

name: Travela
desc: The top level entrypoint widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: main
desc:
Entrypoint for application. This method will try to connect to Firebase
(in production) or a Firebase emulator (in debug mode). It will also load
in theme data for the app.

name: models
desc:
This library contains the different Model classes that are used
throughout the app.

name: Airport
desc: Class that holds information of an Airport.

name: Airport.fromJSON
desc:
Factory method that converts JSON responses from the Google Places API
into Airport objects.

name: latLon
desc: Latitude and Longitude of the airport.

name: name
desc: Name of the airport.

name: placeId
desc: Google Places API Place ID for the airport.

name: Collections
desc: A utility class that is used to designate a class as a Collection.

name: repr
desc:
Returns a String representation of the collection. This is used
for document queries used by the Search Widget.

name: Colorable
desc: An interface used to denote a Data class as capable of having colors.

name: changeColor
desc: Change the color of the Colorable Widget.

name: changeColorFromARGB
desc:
Changes the color of the Colorable Widget using a list of RGB value, e.g.
(R, G, B).

name: color
desc: Color of the Colorable Widget. Default color is Teal.

name: ContainerCollections
desc: Designates a class as a Collection that can contain other collections.

name: Document
desc: Represents a Document object within the database.

name: changeColor
desc: Changes the color of the tile used to represent this Folder.

name: changeColorFromARGB
desc: Changes the color of the tile used to represent this Folder.

name: color
desc: Color of the Colorable Widget. Default color is Teal.

name: construct
desc: Public factory method that constructs a valid Document instance.

name: constructWith
desc:
Public factory method that constructs a valid Document instance from
another valid Document instance.

name: Document.fromFirestore
desc: Factory method to convert JSON responses into Document objects.

name: getCollectionReference
desc:
Returns the Firestore Collection Reference for the parent collection
which this Document belongs to.

name: getDocReference
desc: Returns the Firestore Document Reference which refers to this Document.

name: isValidFilename
desc: Checks if an input name is valid.

name: repr
desc:
String representation of the Document object. This is used only for
the search feature within the app.

name: toFirestore
desc: Returns a Map from a Document instance to be sent to the server.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the Document object.

name: Expense
desc: Represents an Expense object within the database.

name: construct
desc: Factory method that creates an instance of Expense.

name: constructWith
desc:
Method which takes an existing Expense instance, and returns a new
instance of Expense with modified attributes.

name: Expense.fromFirestore
desc: Factory method to convert JSON responses into Expense objects.

name: getCollectionReference
desc:
Returns the Firestore Collection Reference for the parent collection
which this Expense belongs to.

name: getDocReference
desc: Returns the Firestore Document Reference which refers to this Expense.

name: import
desc: Parses a JSON reponse item from the Server into an Expense instance.

name: importWith
desc:
Parses a JSON response item from the Server into an Expense instance
and returns a new instance of Expense with modified attributes.

name: repr
desc:
String representation of the Expense object. This is used only for
the search feature within the app.

name: toFirestore
desc: Returns a Map instance to be sent to the Server as a JSON response.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the Expense object.

name: Folder
desc: Represents a Folder object within the database.

name: changeColor
desc: Changes the color of the tile used to represent this Folder.

name: changeColorFromARGB
desc: Changes the color of the tile used to represent this Folder.

name: color
desc: Color of the Colorable Widget. Default color is Teal.

name: construct
desc: Public factory method that creates an instance of a Folder.

name: constructWith
desc: Constructs an instance of a Folder from a given Folder instance.

name: Folder.fromFirestore
desc: Factory method to convert JSON responses into Folder objects.

name: getCollectionReference
desc:
Returns the Firestore Collection Reference for the parent collection
which this Folder belongs to.

name: getDocReference
desc: Returns the Firestore Document Reference which refers to this Folder.

name: repr
desc:
String representation of the Folder object. This is used only for
the search feature within the app.

name: toFirestore
desc: Returns a Map from a Folder instance to be sent to the server.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the Folder object.

name: Hotel
desc: Class that holds information of a Hotel.

name: Hotel.fromJSON
desc:
Factory method that converts JSON responses from the Google Places API
into Hotel objects.

name: latLon
desc: Latitude and Longitude of the hotel.

name: name
desc: Name of the hotel.

name: placeId
desc: Google Places API Place ID for the hotel.

name: rating
desc: Hotel Rating.

name: status
desc: Business Status of the hotel (operational or closed).

name: Itinerary
desc: Represents a Itinerary object within the database.

name: EMPTY_ITINERARY
desc: Represents an empty Itinerary with no data.

name: construct
desc: Factory method that creates an instance of Itinerary.

name: constructWith
desc:
Method which takes an existing Itinerary instance, and returns a new
instance of Itinerary with modified attributes.

name: delete
desc: Deletes the Itinerary Entry from Firestore.

name: Itinerary.fromFirestore
desc: Factory method to convert JSON responses into Itinerary objects.

name: getCollectionReference
desc:
Returns the Firestore Collection Reference for the parent collection
which this Itinerary belongs to.

name: getDocReference
desc: Returns the Firestore Document Reference which refers to this Itinerary.

name: import
desc: Parses a JSON reponse item from the Server into an Itinerary instance.

name: importWith
desc:
Parses a JSON response item from the Server into an Itinerary instance
and returns a new instance of Itinerary with modified attributes.

name: isEmptyItinerary
desc: Checks if the current Itinerary is an empty Itinerary or otherwise.

name: repr
desc:
String representation of the Itinerary object. This is used only for
the search feature within the app.

name: toFirestore
desc: Returns a Map instance to be sent to the Server as a JSON response.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the Itinerary object.

name: Location
desc: Class that help parse and store a location query from Google Places API.

name: formattedAddress
desc: Formatted address of the Location.

name: Location.fromFirestore
desc: Factory method to convert JSON responses into Location objects.

name: Location.fromJSON
desc:
Factory method which generates a Location object from the Google
Places Place Detail API. More specifically, this method accepts the
"result" object within the response JSON from the API.

name: latLon
desc: Latitude and Longitude of the Location,

name: locationName
desc: Name of the Location.

name: locationVicinity
desc: Vicinity of the Location.

name: Location.ofEmpty
desc: Generates an empty Location object.

name: photos
desc: List of photos of the Location.

name: placeId
desc: Google Places API Place ID.

name: toFirestore
desc: Returns a Map from a Location instance to be sent to the server.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the Location object.

name: url
desc: Google Places search URL for the location.

name: LocationAutoComplete
desc: Class used to contain Autocomplete data from Location searches.

name: LocationAutoComplete
desc: Constructor for LocationAutoComplete.

name: description
desc: Description of the autocompleted Location.

name: LocationAutoComplete.fromJSON
desc:
Factory method to create a LocationAutoComplete object with data
returned from the Google Places AutoComplete API.

name: placeId
desc: Google Place API Place ID.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the LocationAutoComplete object.

name: PlaceOfInterest
desc: Class that holds information of a Place of Interest.

name: PlaceOfInterest.fromJSON
desc:
Factory method that converts JSON responses from the Google Places API
into PlaceOfInterest objects.

name: latLon
desc: Latitude and Longitude of the place of interest.

name: name
desc: Name of the airport.

name: placeId
desc: Google Places API Place ID for the place of interest.

name: rating
desc: Place of interest Rating.

name: status
desc: Business Status of the place of interest (operational or closed).

name: SplashInfo
desc: Class that is used to hold information used on the Splash Screen pages.

name: SplashInfo
desc: Constructor for SplashInfo.

name: description
desc: Description of the Splash Screen page.

name: imageAsset
desc: Image to display on the Splash Screen page.

name: title
desc: Title of the Splash Screen page.

name: Trip
desc: Represents a Trip object within the database.

name: construct
desc: Creates an instance of a Trip.

name: constructWith
desc:
Construct an instance of a Trip using a given instance,
with new attributes.

name: Trip.fromFirestore
desc: Factory method to convert JSON responses into Trip objects.

name: getCollectionReference
desc:
Returns the Firestore Collection Reference for the parent collection
which this Trip belongs to.

name: getDocReference
desc: Returns the Firestore Document Reference which refers to this Trip.

name: import
desc: Parses a JSON response from the Server into an instance of Trip.

name: importWith
desc:
Parses a JSON response from the Server, and allow modifications to the
attributes of the JSON repsonse.

name: repr
desc:
String representation of the Trip object. This is used only for
the search feature within the app.

name: toFirestore
desc: Returns a Map from a Trip instance to be sent to the server.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the Trip object.

name: User
desc: Represents a User object within the database.

name: construct
desc: Public factory method that constructs a valid User instance.

name: constructFromFirebase
desc:
Alternative method that constructs a User instance from a Firebase Auth
User instance.

name: constructWith
desc:
Public factory method that constructs a valid User instance from another
valid User instance.

name: constructWithFirebaseUser
desc:
Constructs a User instance from a Firebase Auth User instance, and
modifies the inner attributes of said instance.

name: User.fromFirestore
desc: Factory method to convert JSON responses into User objects.

name: getCollectionReference
desc:
Returns the Firestore Collection Reference for the parent collection
which this User belongs to.

name: getDocReference
desc: Returns the Firestore Document Reference which refers to this User.

name: import
desc: Converts a Map returned from the Server into a User object.

name: importWith
desc:
Converts a Map returned from the Server into a User object, and allow
modifications done to the User object, with the exception of the
User.creationDate and User.userId.

name: repr
desc:
String representation of the User object. This is used only for
the search feature within the app.

name: toFirestore
desc: Returns a Map from a Document instance to be sent to the server.

name: toString
desc: Official String representation of the User object.

name: services
desc:
This library contains the different Getx Services that are used
throughout the app.

name: AuthenticationService
desc:
GetxService that contains the functions required to trigger an
authentication event.

name: continueWithGoogle
desc:
Authenticate with Google.
Query currently active user with FirebaseAuth class.

name: dispatchLogin
desc: Dispatches login with email calls.

name: handle
desc:
Handles the exceptions thrown by authenticating methods above, and
returns a popup with a short message on why the authentication method
had failed.

name: resetPasswordWithEmail
desc:
Allows the user to reset their email-based account passwords through
a password reset email.

name: signInWithEmail
desc: Tries to sign in to an account with a given email and password.

name: signUpWithEmail
desc: Tries to create a user account with the given email and password.

name: CurrentLocationService
desc: GetxService that manages the current location of the User.

name: computeDistance
desc:
Computes the distance between 2 points on Earth's surface using the
Haversine formula.

name: fetch
desc: Streams the current location of the user and saves it into obsPos.

name: obsPos
desc: Geographical Position of the user.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the CurrentLocationService service.

name: DatabaseService
desc:
GetxService that handles connections and queries between the server
and the endpoints.

name: DatabaseService
desc: Constructor for DatabaseService.

name: firestore
desc: Firebase Firestore instance to track.

name: getCollection
desc: Returns a snapshot of a Collection.

name: getDocument
desc: Returns a snapshot of a Document.

name: streamCollection
desc: Returns a Collection in the form of a Stream.

name: streamDocument
desc: Returns a Document in the form of a Stream.

name: GooglePlacesService
desc: GetxService that provides access to Google Maps API.

name: autocomplete
desc: Returns the list of locations from a given query.

name: client
desc: HTTP Client.

name: concludeSession
desc:
Terminates the query session and resets the session ID.
Repeated use of the same session token will result in excess charges
being incurred.

name: getPlaceDetails
desc: Returns the Place Details of a place

name: locationImage
desc: Returns the URL to the image of the location.

name: sessionToken
desc: Unique Identifier used for session tokens with Google Maps API.

name: uuid
desc: Unique Identifier generator.

name: QueryService
desc: GetxService that manages search queries within the app.

name: docController
desc: Document Controller.

name: expenseController
desc: Expense Controller.

name: itineraryController
desc: Itinerary Controller.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the QueryService service.

name: queryDocuments
desc:
Query for Documents whose String representation (repr) matches or is
contained within the String query.

name: queryExpenses
desc:
Query for Expenses whose String representation (repr) matches or is
contained within the String query.

name: queryItineraries
desc:
Query for Itineraries whose String representation (repr) matches or is
contained within the String query.

name: queryTrips
desc:
Query for Trips whose String representation (repr) matches or is
contained within the String query.

name: reload
desc: Reloads the Service by reloading all associated controllers above.

name: tripController
desc: Trip Controller.

name: userController
desc: User Controller.

name: RequestService
desc: GetxService that handles the friend requests made by users of the app.

name: fetchRequests
desc: Queries the server for any pending friend request for the current User.

name: isLoading
desc:
Observable boolean value that signals if the controller is still loading
data or has completed the loading process.

name: obsRequests
desc: List of Requests received by a User.

name: onInit
desc: Initialises the RequestService service.

name: service
desc: Service that facilitate connections to the Firestore Database on Firebase.

name: to
desc: Returns the latest RequestService that is being tracked.

name: WeatherService
desc: GetxService that handles the querying of data from the OpenWeather API.

name: getWeather
desc: Returns a list of Weathers that is forecasted for the next 5 days.

name: weatherFactory
desc: API client that is used to query for weather data.
